subject: Thailand Internet Cyber Secu
body:
Thailand Internet Cyber Security Network Office wishes to inform you
that we discover a bank account used by Internet fraud scammers and we
also discover your name in that account for those who deposited money
into the bank account.
Do you transfer money before to a Thailand bank account?
Do you know the person you transfer the money to?
How much do you transfer to the Internet fraud scammers?
You have been scammed sometime ago by internet scammers.
Thailand Internet Cyber Security Network,will repay back your total
money to you as soon as we receive full details from you.
Regards
Miss Mongkut Ratanaporn
E-mail: 
thailand@cyber-wizard.com
499 Benchachinda Bldg, Kamphaeng Phet 6 Rd, Ladyao, Chatuchak, Bangkok
Thailand.
+66 2 105 420

subject: Re:   Thailand Internet Cyber Secu
body:
Hello Miss Mongkut Ratanaporn,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, your message has taken me by surprise. I don't recall transferring any money to a Thailand bank account. Could you please provide more details about this? 

Also, could you explain how my name ended up in that account? I'm quite puzzled by this situation.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Betty
